title: Phrasal Verbs - Key Word Transformations
instructions: Complete the second sentence so that it has a similar meaning to the first sentence, using the word given. Do not change the word given. You must use between two and five words, including the word given.

transformations.sentence1: The plane left the ground at exactly 3pm.
transformations.sentence2: The plane _____ at exactly 3pm.

transformations.sentence1: I've decided to start playing tennis this year.
transformations.sentence2: I've decided to _____ tennis this year.

transformations.sentence2: She _____ a lot of responsibility in her new role.
